domain

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    The class for encapsulating buyable squares, and stocks that are not owned. This class also stores the amount of money in the pool.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bank

        public Bank(java.util.ArrayList<Square> outerSquares,
            java.util.ArrayList<Square> middleSquares,
            java.util.ArrayList<Square> innerSquares)
        Constructor for Bank class.
        Parameters:
        outerSquares - ArrayList of Squares located at the outer layer of monopoly board.
        middleSquares - ArrayList of Squares located at the middle layer of monopoly board.
        innerSquares - ArrayList of Squares located at the inner layer of monopoly board.
        Effects:
        gets all the squares in the game. Among them, picks the buyable ones, and populate buyableSquares with those buyable ones. Initializes pool money. Read stocks' data from file collect them under stocks ArrayList.
        Requires:
        outerSquares, middleSquares, and innerSquares are not null.
        Modifies:
        this

    • Method Detail

      • getBuyableSquare

        public BuyableSquare getBuyableSquare(java.lang.String name)
        Search through the buyableSquares ArrayList with given name, and returns corresponding square. If can't found, returns null.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the square for search.
        Returns:
        square with given name, or null if can't found.
        Effects:
        Search through the buyableSquares ArrayList with given, name and returns corresponding square. If can't found, returns null.
        Requires:
        name is not null.

      • isUnownedBuyableSquareLeft

        public boolean isUnownedBuyableSquareLeft()
        Returns true if buyableSquare left in the buyableSquares ArrayList.
        Returns:
        true if buyableSquare left in the buyableSquares ArrayList.
        Effects:
        returns false if size of the buyableSquares is zero, else returns true.
        Requires:
        buyableSquares != null
